description: a(0) = 0, a(1) = 1. let i = a(n-2) and j = a(n-1), then if i,j have a digit in common a(n) is the least novel number having no digit in common with either i or j. If i,j have no common digit, a(n) is the least novel number having a digit in common with at least one of i or j. All digits are decimal.
